name: Magazine CSS Fix â€” Unsanitize
author: Pamasich
label: Unsanitize Magazine CSS
desc:
Kbin supports custom CSS for magazines, but that functionality is limited because kbin wrongly replaces some important CSS characters with HTML escape codes, making the code partially non-functional. This addon fixes the issue by undoing those replacements, making the CSS actually work as expected.

This mod is unnecessary on mbin.
